mainText:
Dear Steve and Family,

I would like to thank you for being part of our daily lives. You are a 
great technology innovator. I wish I have met you in person but I 
already did, by my apple products. I feel really sad because you made an impact in my life. You will be missed.

Thank you Steve. Will pray for your soul.
header: You will be forever part of our lives, Steve!
author: Mark
